CustomField.description: WARNING: This field controls apex functionality for our login page. Do not deprecate while Discovery login is enabled. Do not change Field Name. Designates whether the user should delegate authentication with a single sign-on solution. Used in conjunction with User Access Policy controlling the *Delegated Authentication Enabled permission set and MyDomainDiscLoginDefaultHandler apex class.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Deselect for system administrators and anyone else who will access Salesforce via username and password instead of a single sign-on solution e.g. Okta.
CustomField.label: Login with SSO only
